meanings.sent1: She misreferences the author's name in her essay.
meanings.sent2: Please do not misreference the page number in your report.
meanings.sent3: The student misreferences the historical event in a funny way.
meanings.sent4: His speech misreferences the facts like a broken compass.
meanings.sent5: The tour guide's misreference of the landmark left everyone confused.

meanings.sent1: The misreference in the article caused confusion among readers.
meanings.sent2: Make sure to correct any misreference in the bibliography.
meanings.sent3: The misreference in the map led the hikers astray.
meanings.sent4: Her misreference of the date made the party a week early.
meanings.sent5: The misreference in the manual resulted in a faulty assembly.
